price: 38. Dhammaan waxakani – xumaanteedu - Rabbigaa agti waa lagu neceb yahay.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
